Pre-Game Insights: Miami comes into the matchup with Minnesota as losers of three games in a row.
The Timberwolves averaged 113.0 points per game while allowing opponents to score 106.5 last season.
The Heat averaged 110.1 points per game last season, 47.2 in the paint, 16.4 off of turnovers and 12.8 on fast breaks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Miami Heat (3-5, 10th in the Eastern Conference) vs. Minnesota Timberwolves (6-3, fourth in the Western Conference)
Heat: Kevin Love: day to day (reconditioning), Jaime Jaquez Jr.: day to day (illness)
